verses.verse: <S%G2316>God<s%>, who at sundry <S%G4181>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in various <S%G4187>manners<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in time <S%G3819>past<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>,

<S%G2980>Has<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> his <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G165>worlds<s%>;

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G541>brightness<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the express <S%G5481>image<s%> <S%G5287>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5287>person<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G5342>upholding<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G1411>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, when he <S%G4160>had<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2512>purged<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%>;

Being <S%G1096>made<s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than the <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G3745>as<s%> he has by inheritance <S%G2816>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G846>they<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> said <S%G2036>he<s%> at any <S%G4218>time<s%>, <S%G4771>You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1080>have<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>fathered<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>? <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G5207>Son<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> he brings <S%G1521>in<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%>, he <S%G3004>says<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4352>let<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> he <S%G4675>says<s%>, Your <S%G2362>throne<s%>, O <S%G2316>God<s%>, is <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>: a <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of <S%G2118>righteousness<s%> is the <S%G4464>scepter<s%> <S%G932>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%>.

You have <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>iniquity<s%>; <S%G1223%G99999>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, even <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> with the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3353>fellows<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G4771>You<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> have laid the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G5495>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>:

<S%G846>They<s%> shall <S%G622>perish<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1265>remain<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> shall wax <S%G3822>old<s%> as <S%G5613>does<s%> a <S%G2440>garment<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> a <S%G4018>vesture<s%> shall you <S%G1667>fold<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1667>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall be <S%G236>changed<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G1587>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1587>fail<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2046>said<s%> he at any <S%G4218>time<s%>, <S%G2521>Sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2193%G99999>until<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G4675%G99999>your<s%> <S%G5286>footstool<s%>?
